Hello to everyone. I was in Scotland the week. We call it Britain, but it is mainly the name of the country United Kingdom. Scotland is part of the Kingdom
Edinburgh is the capital of Scotland. It is a historic city made entirely of stone buildings. http://t.co/d0f6leqdfd
I attended a meeting there to improve Turkish - British relations.
